## HorizontalLabelPositionString type

Sets the position of a horizontal label.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type HorizontalLabelPositionString = "inner-right" | "inner-center" | "inner-left" | "outer-right" | "outer-center" | "outer-left";
```
